subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Dressed in the gold jersey the United States women’s soccer team will wear at the World Cup, 6-year-old MacKenzie Ellertson stood on a makeshift stage in a New York City park holding Keegan Markgraf in her arms. Nearby stood Rylie Rampone, and the three youngsters were stealing the show from their moms.
